introduction: 摄影师李笙在桃花岛拍摄时抢摄影机离开后不久发生了灵异事件，他的女朋友演员林皎月在他死后独自在树林中散步，神思恍惚，这时一个长发垂髫的古人将她拉回现实世界。他说见过她，她也觉得见过他，而当他们的恋情伊始，又发生了意想不到的事情……Li SHeng, a photographer who steals the camera when he shoots a film on Taohua Island, and a paranormal event subsequently appears; his girlfriend Lin Jiaoyue, an actress dreamily wanders around the woods alone after his death, as if she lives in a fantasy world. Suddenly, there is a long-haired ancient man pulling her back to the real world. The man claims that he had met her before, and Lin Jiaoyue feels that she had seen him as well. When they are about to start relationship, something unexpected happens...
